meta_file_id.description: Unique identifier of this metadata record

variable_definition.description: Precise definition of variables in data set

storage_type.description: Storage type; Integer, floating point, character, string

code_definition.description: Description of any codes associated with variables

definition.description: List and definition of variable codes

missing_value_code.description: Character used to represent missing data

delimiter.description: Character used to delimit end of field
